name: Export Kit - Lightning Storm
description:
Create web, mobile and desktop apps instantly from your Figma Designs with Export Kit.


Getting Started

*You must be a registered member to use Lightning Storm*


Considering you want to convert Figma, we can assume you have your design ready. Read more about the Figma Design Rules before you begin to avoid errors. Learn more about Using Export Kit with Figma to get started quickly.


Watch the demo video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qVGHz9Hr1bU 


Rule 1: No Empty Layers

You cannot have empty layers in Export Kit, otherwise the export may have display errors. Here is a list of empty layers:

  • A layer with no name
  • A layer with no image/shape
  • A text layer with no text content
  • A folder/group with no child layers


Rule 2: Organize Frames, Layers and Folders

You should always group your layers into folders if they are related and *name your layers*. Read more about Organizing Folders and Layers and Layer Naming Rules.


Rule 3: Frames Are *Pages*

*DO NOT GROUP FRAMES INTO FOLDERS*

You should only add Frames to Level 1 (or the first level within a Page). Export Kit will process Level 1 frames as native pages *only*. If you do not have Level 1 frames then you may get unexpected output results.


Rule 4: Use a Background Layer for Folders

*DO NOT ADD LAYER EFFECTS TO FOLDERS*

Add a Shape Layer to the folder and copy the effects to the shape, this includes Groups, Inner Frames, Components, and Component Instances. This will act as a background to the folder and is supported in almost all environments. Not all environments support folder effects.


Read our Optimization Tips to get detailed examples of user cases and common errors/fixes.
